items.sentence: Having something to do makes the time pass more quickly.
The cat's sleeping on the rug in front of the fireplace.
Tom soon realized that Mary had no intention of leaving.
Tom didn't have time to do everything Mary asked him to.
We tried to get Tom to change his mind, but we couldn't.
Tom said he couldn't remember his French teacher's name.
Tom could've been in Boston by now if he'd wanted to be.
Tom said he thought Mary wasn't good at speaking French.
Tom said he was planning on going to Boston next summer.
Tom isn't out walking his dogs. He's upstairs, sleeping.
